list.project_desc: BeeHive is a REI on-chain Play and Earn RPG game based on the very efficient Tri-Token architecture and playable by anyone. The game takes place on the beehive where 3,000 Bees NFTs work as a community to earn real value cryptocurrencies.Join the colony by buying an Bee NFT, start working and earn $HONEY (BeeGold) salary. Turn it to $SUG for energy, mine to earn more.
list.project_comments: 1.DeFi Kingdoms is a game, a DEX, a liquidity pool opportunity, a market of rare utility driven NFTs, and it all plays out seamlessly in the incredibly badass form of fantasy pixel art. We’re excited to release the DeFi Kingdoms universe to the world. Come join our lovely community!</br>2.DeFi Kingdoms is a game, a DEX, a liquidity pool opportunity, a market of rare utility driven NFTs, and it all plays out seamlessly in the incredibly badass form of fantasy pixel art. We’re excited to release the DeFi Kingdoms universe to the world. Come join our lovely community!3.DeFi Kingdoms is a game, a DEX, a liquidity pool opportunity, a market of rare utility driven NFTs, and it all plays out seamlessly in the incredibly badass form of fantasy pixel art. We’re excited to release the DeFi Kingdoms universe to the world. Come join our lovely community!
